name: create-signing-key
description: Creates a new signing key pair. When creating a new signing key, the API will generate a 2048-bit RSA key-pair and return the private key and a generated key-id; the public key will be stored at Mux to validate signed tokens.

$ul: **created_at**: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.
**id**: Unique identifier for the Signing Key.

**private_key**: A Base64 encoded private key that can be used with the RS256 algorithm when creating a [JWT](https://jwt.io/). **Note that this value is only returned once when creating a URL signing key.**
